bwwExcerpt: The entire cast is terrific, and Gad and Rannells make a dynamite pair, exchanging leader and follower roles with equal conviction. Gad (a correspondent on The Daily Show With Jon Stewart) may be giving the single funniest, most endearing performance on Broadway. But Rannells is not far behind, his character's righteousness at war with his inflated ego.
dtliExcerpt: The Bottom Line: The first Broadway musical from the “South Park” team will have the comedy faithful flocking.
